summary.name: iPhone 13
summary.description: The iPhone 13 was released in September 2021. It is the fifteenth generation iPhone and was released in two other sizes, the 13 Mini and 13 Pro. It comes in six color ways, two of which are new to Apple. The iPhone 13 has components from past iphones such as the A15 bionic chip and classic Super Retina XDR OLED screen. Some new features include a triple lens camera with new focusing features and internal hardware improvements such as an updated stabalizing sensor. Apple works with different factories worldwide to mass produces the parts for the iPhone 13, but the majority of assembly is done in China. The iPhone 13 can be purchased through Apple both online and in Apple retail stores worldwide. Additionally it can also be found through third party sellers on and offline.
